alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 4:52AM CDT until April 11 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... Northeastern Washington County in east central Missouri... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 451 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Anthonies Mill, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Richwoods and Old Mines around 505 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include De Soto, Hillsboro and Olympian Village. This also includes Washington State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
